sentences.sentence: Herbalists infuse the flowers in oil.
sentences.translation: 草药大夫把花朵浸泡到油里。

sentences.sentence: Used by herbalists in Japan since the 10th century to support sinus, lung, and throat health.
sentences.translation: 自十世纪起，日本草药家就用芥末来治疗鼻窦、肝脏、喉咙等处的疾病。

sentences.sentence: Herbalists of one-hour economic circle had higher educational level and higher professional position than other two areas.
sentences.translation: “一小时经济圈”的中药师队伍相对其他两个地区的文化水平较高，且中高级职称者比例较高。
